attributes.action: Implement an immediate embargo of the Russian Federation
attributes.additional_details: The sanctions that have been announced are limited in scope and their impact on Russia's ability to wage war on its neighbors. We need to send the strongest possible signal that aggression will not be tolerated and show our solidarity with the Ukrainian people by taking all meaningful action possible.
attributes.background: In response to the Russian Federation's invasion of Ukraine: To make it illegal for UK companies and individuals to engage economically or militarily with the Russian government, its citizens, or its agents.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
